titleStmt.title: Christ tempted: the divel conquered. Or, A short and plain exposition on a part of the fourth chapter St. Matthew's Gospel. Together with two sermons preached before the University at Oxford, some years since. By John Gumbleden, B.D. and chaplain to the Right Honourable the Earl of Leicester.
titleStmt.author: Gumbleden, John, 1598 or 9-1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Simon Miller, at the Star in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Star in St. Paul's Church-yard
